Dialog Save
--------------------
Text: Cool, Right?
Conversion: Binary
Result: 01000011 01101111 01101111 01101100 00101100 00100000 01010010 01101001 01100111 01101000 01110100 00111111

Save without Dialog
--------------------
Text: Cool, Right?
Conversion: Binary
Result: 01000011 01101111 01101111 01101100 00101100 00100000 01010010 01101001 01100111 01101000 01110100 00111111
